it.polimi.ma.group10.trump.model.game

Class GameMaster

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ma.group10.trump.model.game.GameMaster

  • public class GameMaster
extends java.lang.Object
    This class has a general overview on the game: the game starts from a GM command; it manages players; it can understand the game status; it can restore a game situation starting from a String representing it; it can produce a String representing the current game situation.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void gameConfigurationFromString(java.lang.String configuration)
      This function is charged to re-create a game situation starting from a String representing it
      java.lang.String gameConfigurationToString()
      This function is charged to generate a String that will represent the current game situation
      GameState getGameState()
      get the current status of the game, in order to determine the next action
      static GameMaster getInstance()
      This method is charged to return the only instance inside the game of the GameMaster, following the Singleton design pattern

      The getter of the Players list

      This method is charged to start a new game starting from the players that will participate

      • getInstance

        public static GameMaster getInstance()
        This method is charged to return the only instance inside the game of the GameMaster, following the Singleton design pattern

        The getter of the Players list

      • startGame

        public void startGame(Player player1,
                      Player player2)
               throws DeckException
        This method is charged to start a new game starting from the players that will participate
        Parameters:
        player1 - the first Player that wants to play
        player2 - the second Player that wants to play
        Throws:
        DeckException - if the game is wrongly initialized
        See Also:
        DeckException

      • getGameState

        public GameState getGameState()
        get the current status of the game, in order to determine the next action

      • gameConfigurationToString

        public java.lang.String gameConfigurationToString()
        This function is charged to generate a String that will represent the current game situation
        Returns:
        the String describing the game situation

      • gameConfigurationFromString

        public void gameConfigurationFromString(java.lang.String configuration)
                                 throws CardException,
                                        DeckException,
                                        GameException,
                                        PlayerException
        This function is charged to re-create a game situation starting from a String representing it
        Parameters:
        configuration - the String that represent the game situation to be re-created
        Throws:
        CardException - if a card inside the String is invalid
        DeckException - if the created deck is invalid
        GameException - if the configuration does not follow the game rules
        PlayerException - if the player creation is not conform to the game rules
